profile.name: Alea Farrel
profile.title: Computer & Network Engineer
profile.bio: I'm specializing in robust infrastructure, modern web/desktop development, and intuitive UI/UX design.

about.tagline: Passionate about technology and continuous learning

cards.title: Development
cards.description: Building efficient applications with C++, Qt, and modern web technologies.

cards.title: Networking
cards.description: Designing and configuring complex network infrastructures.

cards.title: UI/UX Design
cards.description: Creating modern and intuitive user interfaces with attention to detail.

projects.name: Rapid Texter GUI
projects.description: Modern typing speed test with stunning GUI interface. Test your finger speed and mental accuracy.

projects.name: Rapid Texter TUI
projects.description: Terminal-based typing trainer with real-time feedback directly from the terminal.

certificates.name: MTCNA
certificates.title: MikroTik Certified Network Associate
certificates.description: Entry-level MikroTik certification covering fundamental networking concepts, basic router configuration, wireless setup, firewall basics, and network management using RouterOS.

certificates.name: MTCTCE
certificates.title: MikroTik Certified Traffic Control Engineer
certificates.description: Advanced MikroTik certification focused on traffic control, Quality of Service (QoS), and bandwidth management techniques for network optimization.

certificates.name: TKJ Excellence Award
certificates.title: Network Engineering Excellence Award
certificates.description: Recognition award for outstanding achievement and excellence in Computer Network Engineering (Teknik Komputer Jaringan) program.

certificates.name: Cluster Training 1
certificates.title: Network Infrastructure Training Certificate
certificates.description: Certificate of completion for network infrastructure training covering router configuration, network topology design, and practical implementation.

certificates.name: Cluster Training 2
certificates.title: Advanced Network Configuration Training
certificates.description: Certificate of completion for advanced network configuration training including VLAN setup, routing protocols, and network security implementation.

certificates.name: Cluster Training 3
certificates.title: Network Security & Management Training
certificates.description: Certificate of completion for network security and management training covering firewall configuration, VPN setup, and network monitoring.

certificates.name: OJM Certificate
certificates.title: Industrial Internship Certificate
certificates.description: Certificate of completion for on-the-job training (OJM) in network engineering, demonstrating practical field experience in network installation and maintenance.

footer.description: Building digital experiences and network solutions with passion and precision.
